Portfolio About me

About me

My name is Tetiana

I am 26 years old. I was born in Ukraine, in the beautiful city of Chernihiv. In September 2022, I came to Canada in the province of Saskatchewan and now I live in the city of Saskatoon. From a young age, I've been captivated by technology's transformative potential. My formal journey into the programming realm began at university with C++, which laid the foundation for my foray into development. To further hone my expertise, I undertook courses like “Web Developer”, “The Complete JAVASCRIPT + REACT Course - From Zero To Result” and “The Complete 2023 Web Development Bootcamp” on Udemy. These courses have equipped me with proficiency in tools and languages such as JavaScript, React.js with API, Node.js, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Webpack, and Git. I am currently a software developer with a passion for working on new and interesting projects. I am constantly striving to grow and always find something new to learn, new tools to implement, and new ways to level up.

Experience and Education

How I can be useful to you

Education

  • UDEMY

    The Complete 2023 Web Development Bootcamp | Remote (2023)
    During this course, I updated and improved my knowledge of technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js. I also became familiar with back-end development technologies, and also got acquainted with SQL and PostgreSQL.

  • UDEMY

    The Complete JAVASCRIPT + REACT Course - From Zero To Result | Remote (2021)
    During the course I learned the basic concepts and principles of JavaScript. Learned to work with AJAX, JSON, API, Node.js (npm), Webpack, Git. I also devoted a lot of time to learning React.js (class based and hooks).

  • UDEMY

    Web Developer Course | Remote (2021)
    During the course I learned the basics of web development. I learned and started working with technologies such as HTML5, CSS3 (Flexbox and Grid), Bootstrap.

  • Chernihiv Taras Shevchenko National Teachers' Training University

    Master's degree | Ukraine (2019 - 2020)
    My formal journey into the programming realm began at university with C++, which laid the foundation for my foray into web development.

Experience

  • Freelance

    Web Developer | Ukraine/Canada (Jan 2022 - Present)
    I have embraced the challenges of freelancing. My responsibilities encompassed:
    - Debugging and troubleshooting front-end issues to ensure peak performance and seamless user experiences.
    - Crafting dynamic, interactive elements for websites and landing pages that align with design specifications.
    - Designing visually compelling web pages and interfaces.
    - Development of web applications using JavaScript and React.js

Skills

What I use at work

HTML5

It is what creates the "skeleton" of your website or application, the fifth version allows me to create a more SEO-optimized structure for your product.

CSS3

This styling language allows me to create absolutely any look and feel for your site or application. All restrictions are given only by your imagination!

JavaScript

This programming language allows you to bring anything to life: sliders, windows, tooltips, tabs, receiving data from the server and much more

Jquery

The Jquery library will speed up development. I won't integrate it into the project unless necessary, but I have the skill to work with it.

Bootstrap

Bootstrap includes HTML and CSS based design templates for typography, forms, buttons, tables, navigation, modals, image carousels and many other, as well as optional JavaScript plugins

React.js

This library allows you to create web applications. I can create the most interactive product specifically for your purposes.

Git

Git is open source distributed version control system designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with speed and efficiency.

SQL

Structured query language (SQL) is a programming language for storing and processing information in a relational database.

PostgreSQL

PostgreSQL is a powerful, open source object-relational database system that uses and extends the SQL language combined with many features that safely store and scale the most complicated data workloads.
